data.name: UpdateDebt
data.value: update CKT_OB_TRN set LAST_UPDATED_BY = @lastUpdatedBy, LAST_UPDATED_TMST = @lastUpdatedTmst, NEW_DEBT_PROC_DT = @newDebtProcDt where (OBG_GENERATED_ID = @obgGeneratedId) and (CSP_NUMBER = @cspNumber) and (CPA_TYPE = @cpaType) and (OB_TRN_ID = @obTrnId) and (OB_TRN_TYP = @obTrnTyp) and (OTY_TYPE = @otyType)
